meanings.definition: The condition of having difficulty seeing objects that are close; farsightedness.
meanings.sent1: Her longsightednesses made it hard for her to read books up close.
meanings.sent2: His longsightednesses meant he needed glasses to see things nearby clearly.
meanings.sent3: The longsightednesses of the microscope made the tiny text look blurry.
meanings.sent4: His longsightednesses in the dark alley made him rely on his sense of touch.
meanings.sent5: The longsightednesses of the binoculars allowed him to see faraway birds clearly.

meanings.definition: A tendency to think about the future and plan for the long term.
meanings.sent1: Her longsightednesses in financial matters helped her save for retirement.
meanings.sent2: His longsightednesses in business made him a successful long-term planner.
meanings.sent3: The company's longsightednesses in investing paid off in the long run.
meanings.sent4: Her longsightednesses in career planning set her up for future success.
meanings.sent5: The longsightednesses of the city planners ensured sustainable growth for the community.
